Question Set #1:

<a href="https://www.gitbook.com/?utm_source=content&amp;utm_medium=trademark&amp;utm_campaign=-MWyt4j29ReMyImgcaO7" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1uwl36a r-z2wwpe r-1rasi3h r-1loqt21 r-18u37iz r-1fdo3w0 r-1mnahxq r-ymttw5 r-5njf8e r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-eu3ka r-1aockid" /></a>

Hello World

# 

<span key="123ef625c231465392cbc731e543512e"><span offset-key="123ef625c231465392cbc731e543512e:0">Hello World</span></span>

<span key="8fe83db55048458c8785e8b80c528cce"><span offset-key="8fe83db55048458c8785e8b80c528cce:0">The smallest React example looks like this:</span></span>

1

<span key="ccd7fc6220714e42b0a2ae684bd8fc06"><span offset-key="ccd7fc6220714e42b0a2ae684bd8fc06:0">ReactDOM.render(</span></span>

2

<span key="cdf41659746e4dc1b24dff2f2cca946d"><span offset-key="cdf41659746e4dc1b24dff2f2cca946d:0"> &lt;h1>Hello, world!&lt;/h1>,</span></span>

3

<span key="2911933e58eb4922bc93e46e454f3837"><span offset-key="2911933e58eb4922bc93e46e454f3837:0"> document.getElementById('root')</span></span>

4

<span key="4082b3de239c4d7b8cda0800c616faf0"><span offset-key="4082b3de239c4d7b8cda0800c616faf0:0">);</span></span>

<img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-h7gdob r-10ptun7" />

Copied!

<span key="fb53d82617c1401fa59a568fe89fe805"><span offset-key="fb53d82617c1401fa59a568fe89fe805:0">It displays a heading saying “Hello, world!” on the page.</span></span>

<span key="98e8a259843b49a9b752398b1afb15ee"><span offset-key="98e8a259843b49a9b752398b1afb15ee:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://reactjs.org/redirect-to-codepen/hello-world" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="37917dd2360d47599c3cab18e685ebd1" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-59211_259-59212-237__"><span data-key="62bd0951ef394d94a18aca5d2102f401"><strong>Try it on CodePen</strong></span></span></a><span key="d2910c36f917451788176b8bf4424432"><span offset-key="d2910c36f917451788176b8bf4424432:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="a6b0a03cbf5b4eb0993fa9aaff5daf3c"><span offset-key="a6b0a03cbf5b4eb0993fa9aaff5daf3c:0">Click the link above to open an online editor. Feel free to make some changes, and see how they affect the output. Most pages in this guide will have editable examples like this one.</span></span>

## 

<span key="0218a9cff0394c2b9d760d308112863b"><span offset-key="0218a9cff0394c2b9d760d308112863b:0">How to Read This Guide</span></span>

<span key="605e487064394ce5aed34a10a1bd9aeb"><span offset-key="605e487064394ce5aed34a10a1bd9aeb:0">In this guide, we will examine the building blocks of React apps: elements and components. Once you master them, you can create complex apps from small reusable pieces.</span></span>

> <span key="1c9d3af7e2194df2952daac2cd7e37d4"><span offset-key="1c9d3af7e2194df2952daac2cd7e37d4:0">Tip</span></span>
>
> <span key="abf817df9ead4979bd4e04fda18ced9f"><span offset-key="abf817df9ead4979bd4e04fda18ced9f:0">This guide is designed for people who prefer </span>**learning concepts step by step**<span offset-key="abf817df9ead4979bd4e04fda18ced9f:2">. If you prefer to learn by doing, check out our </span></span><a href="https://reactjs.org/tutorial/tutorial.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="30073b57944f4d15b90c66fc0f31b106" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-59211_259-59212-237__"><span data-key="08d1df737ee449b98d991627e05a07cb"><span data-offset-key="08d1df737ee449b98d991627e05a07cb:0">practical tutorial</span></span></span></a><span key="065b047f06534341a956a735856af2c9"><span offset-key="065b047f06534341a956a735856af2c9:0">. You might find this guide and the tutorial complementary to each other.</span></span>

<span key="e8ca045400b34a22810aa9414cfffc2e"><span offset-key="e8ca045400b34a22810aa9414cfffc2e:0">This is the first chapter in a step-by-step guide about main React concepts. You can find a list of all its chapters in the navigation sidebar. If you’re reading this from a mobile device, you can access the navigation by pressing the button in the bottom right corner of your screen.</span></span>

<span key="bdb4a6f9bcb1484a867b84f92a9a608a"><span offset-key="bdb4a6f9bcb1484a867b84f92a9a608a:0">Every chapter in this guide builds on the knowledge introduced in earlier chapters. </span>**You can learn most of React by reading the “Main Concepts” guide chapters in the order they appear in the sidebar.**<span offset-key="bdb4a6f9bcb1484a867b84f92a9a608a:2"> For example, </span></span><a href="https://reactjs.org/docs/introducing-jsx.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b9d9b8e88ba14253984c339f7f3fc7f3" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-59211_259-59212-237__"><span data-key="f666ca6a96c74ab993c89abf80c84954"><span data-offset-key="f666ca6a96c74ab993c89abf80c84954:0">“Introducing JSX”</span></span></span></a><span key="2c5d29a723be438983b822195e6e20e3"><span offset-key="2c5d29a723be438983b822195e6e20e3:0"> is the next chapter after this one.</span></span>

## 

<span key="f1352e887edb4fcf8d31eacf577f4f67"><span offset-key="f1352e887edb4fcf8d31eacf577f4f67:0">Knowledge Level Assumptions</span></span>

<span key="c54264bf5ef848f89707dbd945fda2d2"><span offset-key="c54264bf5ef848f89707dbd945fda2d2:0">React is a JavaScript library, and so we’ll assume you have a basic understanding of the JavaScript language. </span>**If you don’t feel very confident, we recommend**<span offset-key="c54264bf5ef848f89707dbd945fda2d2:2"> </span></span><a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/A_re-introduction_to_JavaScript" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="6a1df289e50f47de8dfb8a19394c0153" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-59211_259-59212-237__"><span data-key="f92551095c5d454197dccc738169aba6"><strong>going through a JavaScript tutorial</strong></span></span></a><span key="9a1ffef95d4344b3b6d1ec6ba96f1302"><span offset-key="9a1ffef95d4344b3b6d1ec6ba96f1302:0"> </span>**to check your knowledge level**<span offset-key="9a1ffef95d4344b3b6d1ec6ba96f1302:2"> and enable you to follow along this guide without getting lost. It might take you between 30 minutes and an hour, but as a result you won’t have to feel like you’re learning both React and JavaScript at the same time.</span></span>

> <span key="22506425869041a6a84003884570d5cf"><span offset-key="22506425869041a6a84003884570d5cf:0">Note</span></span>
>
> <span key="463958a6715a43b290d56500fe4cb404"><span offset-key="463958a6715a43b290d56500fe4cb404:0">This guide occasionally uses some of the newer JavaScript syntax in the examples. If you haven’t worked with JavaScript in the last few years, </span></span><a href="https://gist.github.com/gaearon/683e676101005de0add59e8bb345340c" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="be41b6cb57a84fa096b99f472f143b54" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-59211_259-59212-237__"><span data-key="6a46685b578a406e80978464841ed46e"><span data-offset-key="6a46685b578a406e80978464841ed46e:0">these three points</span></span></span></a><span key="3c639271535a4a278dde62ead12cfc58"><span offset-key="3c639271535a4a278dde62ead12cfc58:0"> should get you most of the way.</span></span>

<a href="react-enviorment.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1awozwy r-14lw9ot r-190qawg r-z2wwpe r-rs99b7 r-4dj0k7 r-1loqt21 r-1quu1zo r-1ro0kt6 r-18u37iz r-16y2uox r-1wbh5a2 r-nsbfu8 r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"></a>

Knowledge Level Assumptions
